<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow Spells](/Feats.aspx?ID=3010) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 226 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101)

**Prerequisites**
[Shadowcaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3009)

</column>

---

Hidden darkness whispers to you, teaching you secrets of shadow beyond other spellcasters of your tradition. Add [_replicate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=983), [_shadow army_](/Spells.aspx?ID=994),[_shadow blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=273), [_shadow projectile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=995), [_shadow raid_](/Spells.aspx?ID=996), [_shadow siphon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=274), and [_shadow walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=275) to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.
